column5: I was reminded from Gerrits post oday how many Canadians I met this year on vacation in Mexico.It would be cool if I had a printable business card with the web adress and logo to tell people where the community is.If you walk to the beach at a resort I know you will meet a Canadian who will talk to you about fishing.We may as well have a card to tell him where we are.Its easier than telling him to Google Ontario fisting. Joe
you may want a h not a t or maybe you do
Ooooops,thats how Roy found this place. Joe
Pop a top ,,,,,,,,,,,,,,again. Pass me the botle me friend,,,,,,,,,,,,I save ya.
I am not designing a logo for that...lmao. We do not have a logo, per se (thats French...sorry)...but I'm sure we could come up with something if the demand is there.
That, my friend, is absolutely true.
Seriously,all fisting aside,just a small pritable logo with the website addy on it would be cool.Terry is not allowed to design it.For good reason.But I do like his work. Joe
Why not go all out and get a giant OFC tattoo on your back?

Ohh Ohh!! I love designing logo's ... It was something I should've done in college instead of getting into I.T field  I don't mind trying to come up with a few designs and sharing it.... hahaha... just don't expect it "soon"  hahaha... this isn't 'school' ya know!
The regular OFC logo is fine,I just dont know enough about computers to get it from the screen to the printer in a size that will fit in my wallet. Joe
you just save it to you computer (right  mouse click on picture then left mouse click on save image and print then cut with scissors
that`s why there is no name on the last ones...LOL
